20101218000558.250|20101218000559.500|CCO|>> THEY WERE IN P.E. CLASS 
20101218000559.500|20101218000600.750|CCO|AND ASKED TO RUN A LAP.
20101218000600.750|20101218000602.000|CCO|ONE BOY CALLED THE OTHER 
20101218000602.000|20101218000603.429|CCO|OVER.
20101218000603.429|20101218000604.857|CCO|THEY STARTED DISCUSSING AN 
20101218000604.857|20101218000606.286|CCO|ISSUE THAT WAS BETWEEN THEM.

20101218000607.714|20101218000609.143|CCO|EXCHANGE OF BLOWS, AND IT 
20101218000609.143|20101218000610.571|CCO|WASN'T A FEROCIOUS FIGHT.

20101218000613.667|20101218000615.333|CCO|>> SCHOOL STAFF SEE THIS AS 
20101218000615.333|20101218000617.000|CCO|A TRAGIC ACCIDENT FOR LEE 
20101218000617.000|20101218000618.667|CCO|AND THE 17-YEAR-OLD WHO HE 
20101218000618.667|20101218000620.333|CCO|FOUGHT WITH.
20101218000620.333|20101218000622.000|CCO|HE TOO WAS A EXCHANGE 
20101218000622.000|20101218000623.111|CCO|STUDENT FROM KOREA.
20101218000623.111|20101218000624.222|CCO|>> THEY WERE FRIENDS WHO HAD
20101218000624.222|20101218000625.333|CCO|DISAGREEMENTS.
20101218000625.333|20101218000626.444|CCO|AS BOYS DO SOMETIMES, THEY 
20101218000626.444|20101218000627.556|CCO|GET AGGRESSIVE AND THEY 
20101218000627.556|20101218000628.667|CCO|SWUNG.
20101218000628.667|20101218000629.778|CCO|>> AN AUTOPSY IS PLANNED TO 
20101218000629.778|20101218000630.889|CCO|DETERMINE EXACTLY WHAT
